channel.title: spring-boot on GitOrko
channel.description: Recent content in spring-boot on GitOrko

item.title: Spring - Traefik (Rate Limit)
item.description: Spring Boot application deployed on kubernetes, configured with Traefik ingress controller to rate limit.

item.title: Spring - Apache Kafka
item.description: Spring Boot integration with kafka & kafka streams

item.title: Spring - ReactJS
item.description: Spring Boot web application with reactjs and JWT authentication support, uses bootstrap and google chart.

item.title: Spring - Redis
item.description: Spring boot application integration with redis for messaging & data persistence.

item.title: Spring - Angular
item.description: Spring Boot web application with angular and JWT authentication support, uses clarity for UI components and chart.js for rendering charts.

item.title: Spring - Thymeleaf
item.description: Spring Boot MVC application with Thymeleaf template & basic spring security support, uses bootstrap for CSS and chart.js for rendering charts.

item.title: Spring - QueryDSL
item.description: Spring Boot QueryDSL lets you query the database using domain specific language similar to SQL.

item.title: Spring - RabbitMQ
item.description: Spring Boot with RabbitMQ message broker that implements Advanced Message Queuing Protocol(AMQP)

item.title: Spring - Micrometer
item.description: Spring Boot with Micrometer & Integration with Prometheus & Grafana.
